headline: Western Digital (WDC) Returns to Profitability After Large One-Off Loss, Challenging Bearish Narratives
summary: Western Digital (WDC) posted a return to profitability over the past year after averaging a 20% annual earnings decline for the prior five years, even as a significant one-time loss of $668 million weighed on the most recent trailing twelve-month results as of October 2025. The company’s revenue is forecast to grow by 8.4% per year and earnings by 9.9% per year, both slower than the US market averages. Shares are trading at $150.21, notably above the estimated fair value of $101.42, with net...
